title: Vietnam : number of social network users 2017 to 2023
summary: In general Number of users in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2022 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2022 and 2023.
The highest Number of users in millions, of value 52.8 was reached at Year 2023
Minimum Number of users in millions about 51.9 was reached at Year 2022
min_summary: In general Number of users in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2022 to 2023.
mid_summary: Overall Number of users in millions has increased over the Year.
